title: How do I restore my TalkBand B2 to factory settings?
answer:
Once you have a working Bluetooth connection between your TalkBand B2 and phone, open the Huawei Wear application and touch the settings icon in the upper left corner. Touch Restore factory settings to restore your TalkBand B2 to its factory settings.

Note:

If you restore your TalkBand B2 to the factory settings, all fitness, sleep, and time data on your TalkBand B2 will be deleted. You will also need to pair the TalkBand B2 with your phone again.
